0.text: Bug 23445  [Perspectives] Select All in Window / Customize Perspective Doesn't Work.

1.text: Opening Bug for Dave Ings:  This problem occurs on the 09/07 WSAD driver (which includes 2.0.1).

3.text: Make the resource perspective the default, and open it.

5.text: Go to Window / Customize Perspective and expand Window > Open Perspective.

6.text: About half a dozen perspectives are selected.

8.text: Select all perspectives by checking the "root" check box.

10.text: Select the resource perspective and click on the "Open a Perspective" button  on the left hand toolbar.

12.text: Only 9 of the 16 perspectives are shown.

14.text: The same behaviour occurs if instead you invoke Window / Open Perspective.

15.text: I can't seem to find any preference that configures the length of the list of  perspectives.

16.text: I tried a similar test in Eclipse 2.0, and it works fine there.
